segments.text: What's wrong , Dave ? You look down today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't pass the English exam . How to learn English well ? Can you give me some suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , English is a " paper tiger " . Its natural enemy is adequate practice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have done a lot of reading comprehension exercises , and I also spend much time in memorizing English words .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suggest you read English texts aloud every day , and try to speak more . That will be beneficial to cultivate your sense of the language .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I'll have a try . Maybe I will get high marks next time .
segments.speaker: S2
